main: ^Are you ready to prove your worth to the Don?
Ready: ^Wonderful, do you need me to explain the dungeons?
^No, I've been in the dungeons before
NotReady: ^You're off to a baaa-d start if you're trying to impress the Don.
^Come back to me when you're ready. I'll explain the dungeon run.
Instructions: ^There are infinite levels to the dungeon. Once you get overrun by monsters that's it.
^There is no going back. No checkpoints. So try your best to prove your worth.
^How do I get to the next level?
Gun: ^You get a gun with 8 rounds in one clip. Don't worry though you have infinite ammunition so that you can get through each level with ease.
^How do I get to the next level again?
^Thanks for the info, I'll be on my way now
Ladder: ^To move on to the next level, you need to find the ladder. There is always one in each level.
^However some levels the exit is blocked by tougher opponents. You must defeat the first before moving on!
^Thanks for the info, I'll be on my way now
Bye: ^I wish you the baa-st of luck. I'll be here if you ever have questions. Baa-bye!
